Tok Pisin: Long stat bilong woa ol i save ron klostu tru long antap bilong solwara, tasol taim ol lainim ol 'radar' bilong painim ol sip na balus na ol dispela 'radar' i wok long kamap gut, ol'submarine i mas i go aninit long wara na ol bai i no inap long lukim ol. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Tok Pisin: Em i stap antap long wanpela bilong ol maunten long hap not bilong Mecca, dispela hul bilong ston em i stap hait long olgeta hap bilong graun. 
English:: Mecca is the highest place in the world, at an elevation of 8,848 metres above sea level.
